meanings.definition: A symbol (#) used to indicate a number or pound weight.
meanings.sent1: I saw many octothorpes on the sign, showing the prices of items.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for two octothorpes of sugar.
meanings.sent3: The octothorpes on the scale seemed to be having a weightlifting competition.
meanings.sent4: The octothorpes on the page were like little sharp musical notes.
meanings.sent5: The octothorpes on the ruler made it easy to measure the length.

meanings.definition: A symbol (#) used in social media to tag topics or keywords.
meanings.sent1: She added several octothorpes to her post to make it easier to find.
meanings.sent2: The trending hashtag was filled with octothorpes.
meanings.sent3: The octothorpes at the party were always the center of attention.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like octothorpes, guiding the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The octothorpes on the screen highlighted the important topics.

meanings.definition: A symbol (#) used in telephony to indicate a button on a telephone keypad.
meanings.sent1: Press the octothorpes to connect the call.
meanings.sent2: The octothorpes on the phone were worn out from frequent use.
meanings.sent3: The octothorpes on the keypad seemed to be having a secret meeting.
meanings.sent4: The octothorpes on the phone were like tiny doors to different conversations.
meanings.sent5: The octothorpes on the keypad made dialing numbers quick and easy.
